pullRequest.title: Added new timezone configuration properties for the Hive connector.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adding in hive.*.time-zone configuration properties for parquet, orc, rcfile for release 341
Reviewer: @mosabua

nodes.bodyText: The default is also JVM default tz.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -263,6 +263,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description
 ``hive.file-status-cache-expire-time``             How long a cached directory listing should be considered     ``1m``
                                                    valid.
 
+``hive.parquet.time-zone``                         Adjusts binary timestamp values to a specific time zone.     JVM default  
+                                                   For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. 
+
+``hive.rcfile.time-zone``                          Adjusts binary timestamp values to a specific time zone.     JVM default  
+                                                   For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. 
+
+``hive.orc.time-zone``                             Sets the default time zone for legacy ORC files that did

nodes.bodyText: I don't think "binary" here is significant as Parquet is always binary.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -263,6 +263,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description
 ``hive.file-status-cache-expire-time``             How long a cached directory listing should be considered     ``1m``
                                                    valid.
 
+``hive.parquet.time-zone``                         Adjusts binary timestamp values to a specific time zone.     JVM default

nodes.bodyText: For here I think we want to say binary encoded since that is different from the default rc encoding which is text.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -263,6 +263,15 @@ Property Name                                      Description
 ``hive.file-status-cache-expire-time``             How long a cached directory listing should be considered     ``1m``
                                                    valid.
 
+``hive.parquet.time-zone``                         Adjusts binary timestamp values to a specific time zone.     JVM default  
+                                                   For Hive 3.1+, this should be set to UTC. 
+
+``hive.rcfile.time-zone``                          Adjusts binary timestamp values to a specific time zone.     JVM default

commit.message: Added new timezone configuration properties for the Hive connector.

afterCommit.message: Added new timezone configuration properties for the Hive connector.
